text: Lee Hong-geun (born 28 July 1965) is a South Korean rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of South Korea Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in rowing Category:Rowers at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for South Korea Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games
title: Lee Hong-geun
